title: I'm bored and need something to do.
text: I need to read more books.

title: Read The Silmarillion
text: Look for the light of Valar.

title: Read Dune
text: Follow the spice to real power.

title: Order pizza
text: Reading is tough work, let's eat.

title: Read the Hobbit
text: Must read to set up the greatest fantasy story of all time.

title: Take a nap.
text: Rest in some way. You can't read if you're passed out from exhaustion.

title: Stranger in a Strange Land
text: To grok is to not just know, but to fully understand. Gandalf grokked Saruman, long before anyone else.

title: Read, and read again, The Lord of the Rings
text: And if twice isn't enough (it isn't) then read it again.  It truly is the best fantasy tome ever written.  No other even comes close.
